text: Deyaki poslidovnyky svyatoho pysannya mozhutʹ doviryatysya z vsiyeyu doleyu, ta vony dadutʹ tse nazad do vas. Inshi sered nykh ne mozhutʹ buty doviryatysya z yedynyy dinar; vony ne budutʹ repay vy yakshcho ne vy derzhyte pislya nykh. Shcho tomu, shcho yak kazhutʹ, "My ne povynni buty chesni koly mayutʹ spravu z gentiles!" Otzhe, vony prypysuyutʹ brekhnyu do BOHA, znayucho
